/opt/homebrew/bin/gfortran  -cpp -O3 -isysroot /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX26.1.sdk -mmacosx-version-min=15.6 -dynamiclib -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names -compatibility_version 1.0.0 -current_version 1.0.0 -o libsparseir_fortran.1.0.0.dylib -install_name @rpath/libsparseir_fortran.1.dylib CMakeFiles/sparseir_fortran.dir/src/sparseir.f90.o CMakeFiles/sparseir_fortran.dir/src/sparseir_ext.F90.o  -framework Accelerate /Users/hiroshi/projects/sparse-ir/sparseir-rust/fortran/_install/lib/libsparse_ir_capi.dylib
